author: Okay Google
comment: With the option to download free, then pay for premium features. Well done developer. This is how all watch faces should be... Try before you buy. Paid for and tried so many watch faces, refunded, ended up having Google account deleted! GREAT! Paid for your premium out of appreciation. Keep up the work and hope you bring more faces out 👍
title: Very nice watch

author: Manh DN
comment: Very good watch face on the market. But it has 1 prob on my moto 360 gen2, I cant change to the 2nd free watch hand, it automatically returns to the first one after some minutes using. And pls make some better watch hands that look better, these hands are so ugly, even premium hands. Thanks
title: Good look

author: Kriss Milne
comment: This is my favorite watch face and I come back to it every time. But, a little more customization would be nice and the watch hands do not save after a restart. Please fix this and it's definitely worth 5 stars
title: My favorite watch face, but...

author: Michael Tippett
comment: So I like the overall watch face but I don't understand that after every time I restart my watch or change back to this face from another I have to keep rechoosing the premium hands. I don't understand why it will save my color scheme but not the watch hands
title: Does not save

comment: I have downloaded many of these wear watch faces. By far this one is a keeper. Just one small issue. Noticed that on SmartWatch 3 it cuts the 2 top minute markers.
title: Love this one

author: Chris Bim Woltman
comment: It's a clean look, but each time my watch restarts the hands revert to the default style instead of maintaining the ones I chose to use. Definitely gotta fix that bug, because what fun is it to always have to go switch the hands back after each reboot
title: Looks decent

comment: App keep crashing on phone everytime I open the Wear app and frequently change from a premium config to the default config.
title: Great watch face but...

author: Mark Olney
comment: Would give more stars if there were at least the option to change the battery indicator to something else. Step counter, weather, compass..... etcetera. Also would like to be able to turn off everything but the hands in ambient mode. Paid the $.99 for the extra watch hands, should also include these options I described. These additions would also make it equal in options with many other face makers, who incidentally include these options for no charge. Keep up the good work, great looking watch face!
title: Great looking, Not enough options

author: Samarth Chaturvedi
comment: It is a very cool looking watch face.  I've been searching a lot but couldn't find anything good.  This is the best
title: One of the best

author: JM Ayala
comment: Nice middle ground between too simple and too cluttered. Could use additional options for that last star.
title: Good Looking Face

author: Simon Bartlett
comment: Great watchface. One of the few with enough colour and brightness to work in ambient mode with my LG Urbane 2. Alas google wear 2.0 stops this watchface from working.

author: seungwoo han
comment: It has nice and simple design. But when i using other watch face except default skin, it has been changed to the default skin again and again. Plz fix it
title: Good. But...

author: Cho Shane
comment: I've tried many different types of watch faces and seems like I finally the one I can just leave it on. Also, it seems like it's easy on my LG Watch Urbane battery life. Looks fantastic! Keep it up, guys!! PS how do I reset the color to default?
title: Nice and Simple

author: Surendran Nagarajan
comment: On my Sonywatch 3, battery indicator shows something which I dont understand. App didnt show on my mobile to do any settings too.
title: Cant understand Baterry indacator

author: Jay Boughn
comment: Very cool n sleek watch face. Looks great on Sony Smart watch 3. Nothing fancy...it just works!
title: Style

author: Hendrikkus Hendrikkus
comment: After buy a premium, the selected  premium watch hand always set back to free version. Please fixed this.

reply.author: Nerd Attack!
reply.content: This has already been fixed in the latest update.

title: Premium watch hand cannot used

author: Matt F
comment: Love this face but can no longer use after Wear 2.0   :(  Never shows up in Wear app on phone or on Huawei watch 1 even though it's installed

author: Tzvetan Dimitrov
comment: It's light and beautiful. Doesn't drain the battery snd works very smooth. It's very simple. I wish it has more options, but not if this will make it heavier or luggish....
title: I LOVE this watch face

author: Navin S
comment: This is a very elegant watch face. Looks much better than the screenshot on both square and round ones.
title: One of the best

author: Jorge Luis Pagan
comment: I don't understand why they can't get this right

reply.author: Nerd Attack!
reply.content: Working on the battery meter, the offset is a little bit ... off.

author: karen barclay
comment: Installed on Sony 3 no problems.  Free version lets you change colour accents - looks nice.
title: Nice

author: Horace Johnson
comment: I like changing the colors and hands on the clock. It can go from elegant to tactical with one touch of a button. It can also be made to match whatever I'm wearing.
title: Awesome

author: Andrew Payne
comment: Looks superb on my Huewai W1. Simple yet elegant and kudos to the developer to offer free with a modest in app purchase for additional hands in order to support them.
title: Simple yet elegant

author: JJ Ryan
comment: The best watch face I have. And I have tried them all. I keep coming back.
title: My Fave

author: Arjie Butial
comment: Sometimes the watch is not centered.
title: Ambient mode problem

author: Prabhjeet Singh Channa
comment: Everytime I download another watch face and install I always return to this one. Evergreen Face. Good Work Developer. Hope to see something similar and better soon.

author: Spread Love 2
comment: When I turn my wrist to see the time. Sometimes, it does not come on. I literally have to tap the screen in order for the watch face to present itself. Also, when it does come on, it goes off again within seconds. Moto 360. Please fix.
title: Slow to response

author: Mina Botrous
comment: This watch face looks amazing in my moto360 really well designed, smooth operation and just plan gorgeous
title: Amazing watch face must try

author: Jus Me
comment: All it need is a temperature display.
title: Dang good, but...

author: Shantanu Barik
comment: Good watch face but after few hours premium hands changes automatically to default one. Please fix the same.

author: Alan Kidd
comment: Very nice looking, simple and effective. The chosen hand set keeps resetting to default but otherwise works fine.
title: Nice and simple.

author: Andrew Wallace
comment: Very nice design dev. Love the face. What about a brightness adjustment for ambient screen in the paid version?
title: Clean Design!

author: jae kim
comment: 2wtch face keeps going default.

author: Leon Montgomery
comment: Nice basic watch face. Best part, it literally SIPPS power! Thanks for such a battery saving face.
title: Love It

author: Richard Johnson
comment: This watchface will cause the watch to boot loop after the July 2017 security update.

author: Derek D'Costa
comment: Very nice watch face and features. Really like that i can change the hand colours too
title: A favourite

author: lee hutchinson
comment: Very nice face realy black background  looks well nice on my lg g r watch.
title: Love it

author: Hamzah A
comment: Like how it's nice and clean, wish they had an option for weather. Still really nice
title: Nice and clean

author: Pavel Kasík
comment: Of all the watchfaces I tried, this one I like the best.
title: It's my favorite

author: Andi Darmika
comment: Just unlock the extra feature. Can you add brightness setting for ambient mode please.
